name: Ice Venture!
description:
Monsters have taken over the north and are building furnaces to deal with the cold.  You have to destroy them before the islands will melt. Travel through the islands and destroy all the heat sources as you go your way. Can you destroy them all?

Controls

Play on PC!

WASD - Walking
Spacebar - Jumping
Mouse - Aim
Left mouse button - Shoot snowflakes
Right mouse button - Shoot firestones
Q - Create ice cubes

To change keyboard to QWERTY press Windows + Shift + Spacebar.
